thread.title: UK Budget 2018: Brexit 50p coin will be released on the day Britain leaves the European Union

author: Simon Meechan
title: UK Budget 2018: Brexit 50p coin will be released on the day Britain leaves the European Union
text:
Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get daily
Reports claim the Chancellor is set to reveal a ' Brexit ' 50p coin to mark Britain leaving the EU.
An article, published by the Sun , says the 50p will be available from March 29, 2018 - the day the UK is set to leave the European Union .
MP Philip Hammond will announce the details later today , says the paper, which published an op-ed by the Chancellor on Sunday.
The coin is rumoured to feature the Queen on one side, with the phrase 'Friendship With All Nationsâ€™ on the reverse. Read More
A source told the newspaper: "Brexit is a historic moment which will rightly be commemorated."
Mr Hammond will deliver his final pre-Brexit budget today at 3.30pm. Read More
